| HistoryText             = When the psychic entity knowed as [[Onslaught (Psychic Entity) (Earth-616)|Onslaught]] reborn after the [[M-Day]], [[Franklin Richards (Earth-616)|Franklin Richards]] created with his powers a new Counter-Earth (today know as Franklinverse). In this dimension, Franklin created people based on their counterparts in the [[Heroes Reborn (1996 Event)|Heroes Reborn]] age. Loki, Enchantress, the Scarlet Witch, Skurge, Wonder Man and Ultron, that in the original [[Counter-Earth (Heroes Reborn)|Counter Earth]] were the [[Lethal Legion (Heroes Reborn) (Earth-616)|Lethal Legion]], in this new Counter Earth they are know as the Masters of Evil.
